rows.label: qst201209_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, you're the kids that Volette said
want to make Whelzaman Cookies?

rows.label: qst201209_msg0002
rows.name:
Yep, that's us!
We were hoping you'd teach us!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0003
rows.name: ...Yes. Please.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0004
rows.name:
Right, right. Volette told me the
whole story. Sounds terrible, but
hang in there!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0005
rows.name: We will!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0006
rows.name:
I think I should explain some things
before we get to work.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0007
rows.name: Do you know Whelzaman?

rows.label: qst201209_msg0008
rows.name: No...

rows.label: qst201209_msg0009
rows.name:
In fairytales, he's a Driver who's
protected Invidia since ancient times.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0010
rows.name:
So during harvest time, we give these
cookies to the children, wishing that
they become as strong as Whelzaman.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0011
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst201209_msg0012
rows.name:
The dough itself isn't too difficult, but
then you have to make it into a strong
and cool face, which is tricky!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0013
rows.name: We'll manage!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0014
rows.name: As Blades, we know all about Drivers!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0015
rows.name: ...Even if we lack in artistic inclinations.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0016
rows.name:
You're welcome to use the shop's oven
to bake the cookies, so it'd be cool if
you could take care of the dough.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0017
rows.name: Gotcha!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0018
rows.name: What are the ingredients?

rows.label: qst201209_msg0019
rows.name:
Five Bright Figs, and two chunks
of Sparklesugar.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0020
rows.name:
Also, two Whisper Tomatoes, and then
a Limdo Flamii Egg - you can get those
from defeating Limdo Flamii, naturally.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0021
rows.name:
Got it!
We'll be back right quick!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0022
rows.name:
You'll need a lot of them to hand out,
so you better apply yourselves!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0023
rows.name: ...How much is a lot, exactly?

rows.label: qst201209_msg0024
rows.name: Well, the amount I said makes ten.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0025
rows.name:
I'd say you'll need fifty or so, so
you have to collect five times that.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0026
rows.name: Oh boy...

rows.label: qst201209_msg0027
rows.name:
But we can't give up!
Our reputation is at stake!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0028
rows.name:
I'll be around, so give me a shout
when you've got the goods.

rows.label: qst201209_msg0029
rows.name:
Ah, and no need to break your back
lugging it all. I can bake 'em ten at
a time, so just keep 'em coming!

rows.label: qst201209_msg0030
rows.name: ...Yes.
